body:
Comment 5 by **johan.samyn**: 
Alex,

All you say is true of course. But what's also true, is that on Windows there are other
cases of using %somestring% elements in environment variable values. Of course Windows
itself knows how to handle those. But I'm sure a bunch of other programs do too. But
apparently not all of them, and neither does Go.

But never mind, I really can live with a wontfix for this, now that I know the cause,
and how to avoid it. Thanks for helping out on this.

Johan
